edu.ncsu.csc216.book_quiz.question
Class BookQuestions

java.lang.Object
  edu.ncsu.csc216.book_quiz.question.BookQuestions

public class BookQuestions
extends java.lang.Object

Implements a Finite State Machine for question sequencing, additions, and transitions.

Author:
AlexiaMoore

public java.lang.String[] getCurrentQuestionChoices()
                                             throws EmptyQuestionListException
Returns the question choices of the current question

Returns:

Throws:

processAnswer

public java.lang.String processAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
                               throws EmptyQuestionListException
Processes the answer submitted by the user. BookQuestions relies on its current state to handle the processing. This method may throw an EmptyQuestionListException if the answer cannot be processed.

Parameters:
answer - the answer to be processed
Returns:
the string that should be returned based on the given answer
Throws:
EmptyQuestionListException - if the answer cannot be processed
